intros.list: Browse the list and open an item to see details or actions.
intros.sort: Reorder the list to match your preferred order.
intros.editor: Edit the content and use the action bar to apply or cancel.
intros.settings: Adjust the available settings for this area.
intros.info: Read the information and close the dialog when done.
intros.search: Search and select a result from the list.
intros.searchMap: Search and select results using the map.
intros.picker: Choose an item and confirm your selection.
intros.chat: Read the conversation and use actions to respond or manage messages.
intros.scan: Scan a code and follow the result.
intros.qr: Show or share this QR code.
intros.legal: Read the legal information and related links.
intros.report: Provide the details needed to submit a report.
intros.connect: Connect with a contact by scanning or sharing codes.
intros.tileEdit: Edit the tile content and appearance.

selection.title: Selection
selection.desc: Tap an entry to open details or choose it.

actions.title: Action bar
actions.desc: Use the action bar buttons to close, apply, or confirm.

cancel.title: Cancel
cancel.desc: Closes the dialog without saving changes.

apply.title: Apply
apply.desc: Closes the dialog and saves your changes.

sort.title: Sorting
sort.desc: Drag items to change their order.

filter.title: Filters
filter.desc: Show unread, read, or all items.

search.title: Search
search.desc: Enter a term to find results.

map.title: Map
map.desc: Move and zoom the map to explore.

content.title: Content
content.desc: Review and edit the content in this dialog.

media.title: Media
media.desc: Add or adjust images and other attachments.

chat.title: Conversation
chat.desc: Read messages and use actions to reply or manage them.

scan.title: Scanning
scan.desc: Point your camera at a code to scan it.

qr.title: QR code
qr.desc: Show this code to connect or share.

user.title: My account
user.intro: This screen manages your local account on this device: create backups, change your PIN, control security actions, and delete the account.

backup.title: Backup
backup.desc: Creates an encrypted backup of your local data. You choose the storage location and set a dedicated backup PIN.

changePin.title: Change PIN
changePin.desc: Sets a new PIN for this user on this device. The PIN protects local access to the account.

resetKeys.title: Reset security keys
resetKeys.desc: Generates new cryptographic keys for private communication. Existing private messages can no longer be decrypted afterwards.

delete.title: Delete user
delete.desc: Permanently removes this user including related data on this device and on the backend.

close.title: Close
close.desc: Closes the dialog without taking further action.

privacy.title: Privacy and storage
privacy.desc: Frontend: user data is stored locally in IndexedDB and additionally protected by PIN. Backend: only operational metadata is stored (for example user ID, public keys, status data). Private content is transferred end-to-end encrypted and stored encrypted wherever technically possible.

profile.title: My profile
profile.intro: This screen manages your profile on this device: choose or remove an avatar, adjust style, and save changes.

avatar.title: Select or edit avatar
avatar.desc: Opens avatar selection (file or Unsplash) or editing for an existing avatar.

avatarDelete.title: Remove avatar
avatarDelete.desc: Removes the currently selected avatar from your profile.

style.title: Change style
style.desc: Cycles the default style used for your own content.

close.title: Close
close.desc: Closes the dialog and discards unsaved changes.

privacy.title: Privacy and storage
privacy.desc: Profile name and avatar are stored locally. If you explicitly share your profile with contacts, shared profile data is transferred end-to-end encrypted.

systemMessages.title: System messages
systemMessages.intro: System messages keep you informed about moderation and system events. Tap a message to see details.

inbox.title: Inbox
inbox.desc: Shows all system messages; unread ones are highlighted.

filters.title: Filters
filters.desc: Switch between unread, read, and all.

details.title: Details
details.desc: Open a message to view case info, reason, content type, and timestamp.

actions.title: Actions
actions.desc: Mark as read/unread, delete a message, or open the case status link when available.

deleteAll.title: Delete all
deleteAll.desc: Removes all messages in the current list.

avatarCropper.title: Crop avatar
avatarCropper.intro: This screen lets you adjust the visible area of your profile image before applying it.

crop.title: Set crop area
crop.desc: Drag and scale the selection frame to choose the part of the image you want to use as avatar.

abort.title: Cancel
abort.desc: Closes the dialog without applying the cropped image.

apply.title: Apply
apply.desc: Applies the current crop as your new profile avatar.

privacy.title: Privacy and processing
privacy.desc: Cropping and compression run locally in the browser. The result is stored only in your profile; sharing happens only if you explicitly share your profile with contacts.
